lead_paragraph: KELLOGG--Frederick Fuller, Jr.,on June 22, 2016 of Little River, SC and New York City. He was a graduate of Stevens Institute of Technology (1950). He was a licensed Professional Engineer and served as Chief Engineer for the Village of Larchmont for over two decades. He was a member of the Circumnavigators Club, Mayflower Society, Society of Colonial Governors, and the SAR. He was active in sports and in his youth won several championships in track and field as well as the 1946 Westchester county diving championship. He is survived by his sister, Dr. Joan Renz, by his sons Freddie and David, and by his four grandchildren. Services will be held on Tuesday, June 28, 2016 at 11:00am at Church of the Incarnation, 209 Madison, New York, NY 10016. Interment with his late wife Dyane at Sleepy Hollow Cemetery. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KELLOGG, FREDERICK FULLER, JR.
